action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains six Tetris-like blocks arranged in no particular order. Each block is a different color: red, purple, orange, yellow, dark purple, and red again. The shapes resemble the Tetris game pieces known as "Tetriminos."

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of Tetris-like blocks in different colors. There are two blue L-shaped blocks, one in the upper right corner and one in the bottom left corner. There is a green L-shaped block in the center right side. A grey plus-shaped block is located in the bottom center, and a dark blue T-shaped block is in the center left. The background is white, and the blocks are arranged in a way that they do not form a complete line or square.
